author: jochen
msg: The object factory was using the type names and not the element names in the createFoo() methods.

author: jochen
msg: Test suite is running with haltOnFailure="yes" again.

author: jochen
msg: The web.xml file is now generated dynamically.

author: jochen
msg: Added support for creation of a Clover report. See misc.xml for details.

author: jochen
msg: Workaround for a bug in Clover: The parser is unable to handle references to primitive classes like "char.class". The workaround is to use the static variables like "Character.TYPE".
